verbose_text: Evodiamine (Evo), the structure of which is shown in XREF_FIG, is an alkaloidal component extracted from the fruit of Evodia rutaecarpa (Juss) Benth. Previous studies have shown that Evo can attenuate chronic high-glucose challenge inflammatory injury, protect septic mice against acute lung injury, restrain tumor activity in several types of human cancer (12-14), and improve acute inflammatory cerebral ischemia.
evidence: Evodia rutaecarpa (Juss) Benth. Previous studies have shown that Evo can attenuate chronic high-glucose challenge inflammatory injury
